sen.j: 福浦港（ふくらこう）は、石川県志賀町（旧・富来町）にある地方港湾。
sen.e: Fukura-ko Port (福浦港 in Chinese characters) is a local port in Shika-machi (former Togi-machi), Ishikawa Prefecture.
Fukura-ko Port (福浦港 in Chinese characters) is a local port in Shika-machi (former Togi-machi), Ishikawa Prefecture.
Fukura-ko Port (福浦港 in Chinese characters) is a local port in Shika-machi (former Togi-machi), Ishikawa Prefecture.

sen.j: 「ふくらみなと」とも呼ばれる。
sen.e: It is also called "Fukura-minato Port."
It is also called "Fukura-minato Port."
It is also called 'Fukura-minato Port'.

sen.j: かつては「福良港」とも書かれた。
sen.e: It was once also written as "福良港."
It was once also written as "福良港."
It was once also written as '福良港'.

sen.j: 能登半島の西端に位置。
sen.e: The port is located at the west end of the Noto Peninsula.
The port is located at the west end of the Noto Peninsula.
The port is located at the west end of the Noto Peninsula.

sen.j: 入り江が「北湾」、「南湾」に別れている。
sen.e: The cove consists of "North Bay" and "South Bay."
The cove consists of "North Bay" and "South Bay."
The cove consists of 'North Bay' and 'South Bay.'

sen.j: 奈良時代に、遣唐使や渤海使が出航し、江戸時代以降も重要な港として、能登文化の中心になった。
sen.e: Japanese envoys left from this port for Tang Dynasty and Bohai Kingdom in the Nara period, and the port remained to play an important role as a center of Noto culture after the Edo period.
Japanese envoys left from this port for Tang Dynasty and Bohai Kingdom in the Nara period, and the port remained to play an important role as a center of Noto culture after the Edo period.
Japanese envoys left from this port for Tang Dynasty and Bohai Kingdom in the Nara period, and the port remained to play an important role as a center of Noto culture after the Edo period.

sen.j: 最近は利用する船舶の減少が続いていたが、好漁場まで近距離にあることを生かし、漁業の根拠港の役割を果たしている。
sen.e: Although the number of boats and ships using the port had continued to decline in recent years, the port serves as the fishery base, taking advantage of its location near fertile fishing grounds.
Although the number of boats and ships using the port has continued to decline recently, the port serves as a fishery base, taking advantage of its location near fertile fishing grounds.
sen.cmt: had continued to decline in recent years → has continued to decline recently
sen.e: Although the number of boats and ships using the port has continued to decline recently, the port serves as a fishery base, taking advantage of its location near fertile fishing grounds.

sen.j: 能登半島国定公園の景勝地、能登金剛も近い。
sen.e: The port is also located near Noto Kongo, a scenic spot of Noto Peninsula Quasi-National Park.
The port is also located near Noto Kongo, a scenic spot of Noto Peninsula Quasi-National Park.
The port is also located near Noto Kongo, a scenic spot of Noto Peninsula Quasi-National Park.

sen.j: 港の灯台には福浦灯台が利用されている。
sen.e: Fukura Lighthouse covers the port.
Fukura Lighthouse covers the port.
Fukura Lighthouse covers the port.

sen.j: かつては、日本で最初の木造灯台、油火灯台である旧福浦灯台が利用されていた。
sen.e: Former Fukura Lighthouse, which was the first wooden lighthouse in Japan and used an oil lamp, was once used.
Former Fukura Lighthouse, which was the first wooden lighthouse in Japan and used an oil lamp, was once available.
sen.cmt: was once used → was once available
sen.e: Former Fukura Lighthouse, which was the first wooden lighthouse in Japan and used an oil lamp, was once available.
